name: Crazy-Game (Demo Version)
description:
This is the demo version of the game. The full game does not have a planned release date yet.

Crazy-Game is a platform fighter with various animals, objects... and a few people, as playable characters. It originally started as a old comic series from ~2019, oddly enough.

-Player Controls (I Heavily advise for you to use a controller extension for Players 3 and onward)-

P1:

Arrow Keys to Move

O to jump

P to attack

I to use a heavy attack

9 to use a special attack

P2:

W A S D Keys to Move

F to jump

G to attack

E to use a heavy attack

Q to use a special attack

P3:

J B N M Keys to Move

, to jump

. to attack

k to use a heavy attack

l to use a special attack

P4 (Note that these controls are shoved to the side to leave space on the keyboard):

- Key to move left

_ Key to move Right

+ Key to use upward attacks

= Key to use low attacks

[ to jump

{ to attack

] to use a heavy attack

} to use a special attack

-Other Controls-

Enter Key to pause (In-game) or start a match (In Character Select Screen

The rest is self explanatory

-Credits-

All Sounds, Music and Characters (If you can call them that) made by me

Menu Engine by @Shadowmonster999

Original Text Engine by @twonerds

Watch this game get like five views
